Here is what happens when I remove those "empty" interfaces. Technically they are not empty because they extend from i18nAPI. I did try to use `type` instead of interface but `type` does not work the same way. If you have another solution I will be happy to implement your idea.
Oops, I missed the base types.  Makes sense to me.
